name: Brown Bear Leg Armor
description: Brown Bear Armor is an upgrade to Bone Armor , offering higher physical resistance with a boost to melee attack speed. Though it may not increase attack damage, it pairs well with the Calibrated Grip Attachment s and Attack Speed Attachment s, further increasing knife attack speed.
